snippet.title: PAYDAY 3: Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Boys in Blue DLC is out today on PC, Xbox Series X | S, and PlayStation 5!
 
The Boys in Blue heist tasks the gang with breaking into a secure holding facility of the NYPD on Vlad’s behalf. He wants his gold back, and the gang has never let him down before.
 
Releasing alongside the DLC, the Boys in Blue free update will be available for all players, and includes:
• Solo Mode Beta (on all platforms)
• New heister Clover, originally introduced to the PAYDAY series in 2014, including a gun and weapon charm 
• New Primary weapon – LMG
• 3 new masks
• 12 new flag stickers
• Loadout renaming
• Nvidia DLSS 3.0 Ready, offering a great boost to performance for anyone with a recent Nvidia graphics card
• Twitch drops

👇 Stay connected 👇
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/PAYDAYGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/paydaygame/
Discord: https://discord.gg/paydaygame
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/paydaythegame/
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@paydaygame

Visit our website: https://www.paydaythegame.com/
